definition: PayPal (Internet payment and money transfer company)

sentences.english: How, Thompson asked, could PayPal capture more of that business?
sentences.chinese: 汤普森询问贝宝怎样才能抓住更多的生意机会？

sentences.english: Closing a PayPal account is pretty simple.
sentences.chinese: 关闭一个贝宝帐户非常简单。

sentences.english: Looking for someone experienced with virtuemart to fix the code paypal displays.
sentences.chinese: 与商城寻找解决该代码显示贝宝经历的人。

sentences.english: You will install and config Virtuemart, adding Paypal and Google Checkout.
sentences.chinese: 您将安装和配置零售商资讯，添加贝宝和谷歌结帐。

sentences.english: And then a link to paypal and back to a thank you page.
sentences.chinese: 然后一个链接到贝宝，回到一个感谢页面。

sentences.english: Subsequent payments will be made bi-weekly through PayPal.
sentences.chinese: 之后的付款将通过贝宝双周刊。

sentences.english: Now he accepts payments from customers into the same PayPal account he uses to pay his vendors.
sentences.chinese: 如今他用同一个贝宝账户收取销售款，支付货款。

sentences.english: Soon other PayPal engineers were asking to be transferred to the project.
sentences.chinese: 不久，另一些贝宝的工程师也被调到这个项目。

sentences.english: For now, PayPal has shied away from using revolutionary rhetoric.
sentences.chinese: 如今，贝宝不再发出革命的豪言壮语。

sentences.english: Thompson wants to change this with PayPal's upcoming offering.
sentences.chinese: 汤普生想要用贝宝即将提供的来改变。

sentences.english: Bedier’s team argued that PayPal’s users seemed to have plenty of ideas.
sentences.chinese: 贝迪耶的人说贝宝的用户似乎有很多点子。

sentences.english: But perhaps nobody is as ambitious as PayPal.
sentences.chinese: 但是，也许贝宝是最有雄心壮志的。

definition: Uber, app-based taxi company founded in 2009

pinyin: Niu3 yue1 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3

definition: Google, Internet company and search engine
Ant Financial Services Group, an affiliate company of Alibaba 阿里巴巴[A1 li3 ba1 ba1]
